name: We Scream
description:
We Scream!

Sharing an ice cream cone with a friend. Made in 48hrs by Meg and Andrew Armstrong for GMTK Jam 2019, Theme: "Only One". <3

"R" to restart, "M" to mute.

Be sure to leave a rating!
